name: Sucker Punch VR
description:
Sucker Punch is a heart-pounding single and multiplayer experience! Battle your opponents using an arsenal of power-ups! Punch point cubes as they come at you to send them flying back at your opponent. Unleash power-ups to overwhelm your opposition and defend your goal!

UNLEASH YOUR POWERS - YOUR WAY

Build your arsenal of gloves and drones each with their own powers. Mix and match your equipment to find your perfect playing style. Are you a heavy hitter who waits for the big strike, or do you prefer a fast and agile build?

SINGLE AND MULTIPLAYER

Play a single match versus AI, or grab a friend and go head-to-head via multiplayer. Need a bigger challenge? Play a season and climb the league tables for trophies and ultimate glory!

FEATURES

  • Fast-paced and fun! Easy to learn and a blast to master.
  • An arsenal of gloves, each with unique powers. Mix and match to find your play style and tactics.
  • Drones! Equip a buddy drone. They'll be your sidekick and help you to victory!
  • Gain XP. Level up. Unlock...and Power up!
  • Single-player: Choose your level and match yourself against AI opponents.
  • League play with progressively more difficult divisions and trophies to win.
  • Multiplayer: Go head-to-head with a friend.
  • Daily Challenges: A new and unique challenge each day. Can you get the highest score on the global leader board?.
  • An ever expanding library of new gloves, powers, and arenas!
  • LIV support!

JOIN US

Click the banner to join us on Discord and become part of our community!
